Name: Essence-Grade Bone Meal
Description: A culinary byproduct primarily repurposed as garden fertilizer.
Description$english: A culinary byproduct primarily repurposed as garden fertilizer.
Description2$english: It is made by boiling wild animal horns, drying them, and grinding them into a nutrient-rich powder—ideal for nourishing flowers and plants. Rich in essential nutrients.
